text:
The line height differs between the AWTRenderer and the PDFRenderer. It seems
that the line-height is applied correctly for the PDFRenderer, but fails for the
AWTRenderer.
creator: jhn@eos.dk

text: Works fine in fop 0.20.4. Probably fixed already.
